benchmark_details.name: Aya Dataset: An Open-Access Collection for Multilingual Instruction Tuning
benchmark_details.overview: We create the largest human-annotated multilingual instruction fine-tuning dataset to date, consisting of over 204K instances that cover 65 languages. We include a data card for the AyaDataset.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To bridge the language gap by building a human-curated instruction-following dataset spanning 65 languages.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: There is still only a tiny fraction of the worldâ€™s linguistic diversity covered.

methodology.calculation: The average approval ratio as T+/T, where T+ is the total number of thumbs up and T is the total number of votes.
methodology.interpretation: Average approval ratio of 1.0 indicates perfect quality.
methodology.validation: The dataset was validated through peer review.

targeted_risks.demographic_analysis: The contributor pool is diverse in terms of geography, age, and dilogue.
